code: import _toConsumableArray from"E:/Axoms course/Module B/Mern Stack Projects/contact-manager/client/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/toConsumableArray";import{SET_ALERT,REMOVE_ALERT}from'../types';var alertReducer=function alertReducer(state,action){switch(action.type){case SET_ALERT:return[].concat(_toConsumableArray(state),[action.payload]);case REMOVE_ALERT:return state.filter(function(alert){return alert.id!==action.payload;});default:return state;}};export default alertReducer;
